title: UNIT R1.1 — Orientation & Heroes
desc: Text looks like chaos. Learn the single rule: every block has one main consonant.

examples.text: ភាសាខ្មែរមិនមានចន្លោះរវាងពាក្យទេ។

description: In Khmer, there are no spaces between words.
data.footer: Tiny irony: Yes. This is normal. Get used to it.

data.name: So… how do people read this?
data.footer: Find the Hero. Ignore the Accessories.

data.title: R1.1.3 — Observation
data.name: You may have noticed something
description: Every block is built around **ONE** main letter.
It’s like a game of **“find me”**.
data.footer: Tap the first letter to catch the Hero.
data.word: ចាប់ខ្ញុំបើអ្នកអាច

data.title: R1.1.6 — Same or Different?
data.explanation:
These look like twins, but they are not.
One belongs to the Solar Team, the other to the Lunar Team.
Mixing them changes the meaning.

data.title: R1.1.4 — Select only the Heroes
data.subtitle: Tap the main big letters.
data.prompt:
Khmer text has noise. Find ONLY the Consonants (Heroes).
Everything else is decoration.
data.success_text: ✅ Correct. Heroes are the big skeletons.
data.fail_text: ❌ That is an accessory (vowel or sign).
